channel.title: The Order of Týr Podcast (Ogg Edition)
channel.description: This is the edition of The Order of Týr Podcast which is delivered in Ogg Vorbis format.

item.title: Podcast #044 – Let’s Talk About Some Vidya Gamez
item.dc:creator: Michael
item.description: In this week’s edition of the OoT Podcast, Jordan and Mike dive back into some video game talk with a few recent releases that have been on their minds including Retro City Rampage, Resident Evil 6, and Borderlands 2. Also, it is made abundantly clear that Order of Týr is, in fact, on the [...]
item.content:encoded:
In this week’s edition of the OoT Podcast, Jordan and Mike dive back into some video game talk with a few recent releases that have been on their minds including Retro City Rampage, Resident Evil 6, and Borderlands 2. Also, it is made abundantly clear that Order of Týr is, in fact, on the internet.



Music: Machinae Supremacy - Sidology 3 – Apex Ultima
item.itunes:keywords: Borderlands 2, Retro City Rampage, Resident Evil 6, Video Games, Chiptunes, metal
item.itunes:subtitle: - In this week's edition of the OoT Podcast, Jordan and Mike dive back into some video game talk with a few recent releases that have been on their minds including Retro City Rampage, Resident Evil 6, and Borderlands 2. Also,
item.itunes:summary:
In this week's edition of the OoT Podcast, Jordan and Mike dive back into some video game talk with a few recent releases that have been on their minds including Retro City Rampage, Resident Evil 6, and Borderlands 2. Also, it is made abundantly clear that Order of Týr is, in fact, on the internet.
Music: Machinae Supremacy - Sidology 3 - Apex Ultima

item.title: Podcast #043 – The OoTPC is B-A-C-K
item.dc:creator: Jordan
item.description: We talk about things that happened…because, you know…things happened…and my mic craps out when I get excited, but the OoT Podcast is back!!!! Music: Machinae Supremacy - Sidology 3 – Apex Ultima
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Podcast #042 – Sonic Generations and Catherine Spoiler Extravaganza
item.dc:creator: Michael
item.description: Mike spends some time geeking out about some of the Easter Eggs sprinkled throughout Sonic Generations (spoilers) and then Jordan leads an in-depth discussion on Catherine (more spoilers). There is also some talk about Grasshopper Manufacture’s upcoming game, Lollipop Chainsaw. Oh and apparently Mike still needs to play Bayonetta. Music: Machinae Supremacy - Sidology 3 – Apex Ultima
item.content:encoded:
Mike spends some time geeking out about some of the Easter Eggs sprinkled throughout Sonic Generations (spoilers) and then Jordan leads an in-depth discussion on Catherine (more spoilers). There is also some talk about Grasshopper Manufacture’s upcoming game, Lollipop Chainsaw. Oh and apparently Mike still needs to play Bayonetta.


Music: Machinae Supremacy - Sidology 3 – Apex Ultima
item.itunes:keywords: Sonic The Hedgehog, Catherine, Katherine, Order of Týr, Bayonetta, Lollipop Chainsaw, Video Games

Mike spends some time geeking out about some of the Easter Eggs sprinkled throughout Sonic Generations (spoilers) and then Jordan leads an in-depth discussion on Catherine (more spoilers). There is also some talk about Grasshopper Manufacture's upcoming game, Lollipop Chainsaw. Oh and apparently Mike still needs to play Bayonetta.

item.title: Podcast #041 – Fantasy/Comic Con, Online Passes, What we’re playing/watching
item.dc:creator: Michael
item.description: Still on a massive high from the Memphis Comic & Fantasy Convention, Jables and I discuss our comic con experiences, what games we’re playing/going to play, and what web series we’ve been into lately. Also, Online Passes rant, because VIDEO GAMES. Music: Machinae Supremacy – Sidology 3 – Apex Ultima
item.content:encoded:
Still on a massive high from the Memphis Comic & Fantasy Convention, Jables and I discuss our comic con experiences, what games we’re playing/going to play, and what web series we’ve been into lately. Also, Online Passes rant, because VIDEO GAMES.


Music: Machinae Supremacy – Sidology 3 – Apex Ultima

item.dc:creator: Jordan
item.description: They’re up in our .com h4x1n’ our gearz of war. Also, we talk about a bunch of game demos, and I rant about Comcast, lulz. Music: Machinae Supremacy – Sidology 3 – Apex Ultima

item.title: Podcast #039 – The Q&A – Target: The Hammer K
item.dc:creator: Jordan
item.description: Donna and I set up an inquisition of Mike to determine if he is or is not a robot. Music: Machinae Supremacy – Sidology 3 – Apex Ultima

item.title: Podcast #038 – OoT News, RE 3DS, and Transformers 3
item.dc:creator: Jordan
item.description: This week’s episode brings a flood of Order of Týr updates, anger about the attack on used games, and at least a little bit of a release due to some things not totally sucking. Music: FIGHT!! Version #1 from Grandia II

item.title: Podcast #037 – Duke Nukem Forever & Game Industry Rants
item.dc:creator: Jordan
item.description: Mike and I lament about the new Duke Nukem game, talk about some movies that made their ways into our lives only due to Netflix, and pine over the current state of the video game industry. Music: she – chiptek (download the album for free under the CC By-NC-ND 3.0 license)
item.content:encoded:
